Question
========

Given are the following sample outcomes: 28, 23, 17, 30, 28, 21. The median of this sample is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 23
* 24.5
* 25.5
* 28

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 23: Incorrect
* 24.5: Incorrect
* 25.5: Correct
* 28: Incorrect
